text: Ra musa nagarama yasto bela pravesa gare jabaki tyahamka manasiharu saceta thi'enan. Tyaham unale dekhe ki du'ijana manisaharu jhagada gariraheka thi'e. E'uta ta musako jatimadhyeko thiyo ra arkae unako dusmanamadhyeko thiyo. Juna vyakti unako jatiko thiyo, tyasale arkae vyaktiko mukabilama, jo musako satrumadhye thiyo, sahayata mamgyo, taba unale (musale) usala'i mudkile prahara gare ra usala'i marihale. ‘‘Musa’’ bhannathaleh ki yo saitanako karavahi ho. Niscaya nai saitana ta spasta satru ra pathabhrasta garnevala cha
